fields.name: CustNameOrg
fields.label: Project Initiator (Customer)
fields.description: Name of customer (organization).

Department of Energy (DOE): Office of Energy Efficiency & Renewable Energy (EE)
Department of Health and Human Services: Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
Department of the Treasury (TREASURY): U.S. Bureau of Engraving and Printing (BEP)
Department of Agriculture (USDA): Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service (APH)

fields.name: CabinetAgency
fields.label: Cabinet Agency
fields.description: The cabinet agency name for the sub agency engaging in the project.

fields.name: ElectricUtility
fields.label: Primary Electric Utility
fields.description: Name of utility providing majority of the electricity.

fields.name: NGUtility
fields.label: Primary Natural Gas Utility
fields.description: Name of utility providing majority of the NG

fields.name: WaterUtility
fields.label: Primary Water Utility
fields.description: Name of utility providing majority of the Water

fields.name: AvgAnnEnergyCons
fields.label: Avg Annual Energy Consumption of Affected Buildings
fields.description: Average annual energy consumption of affected buildings (MMBtu/year)

fields.name: FloorArea
fields.label: Floor area
fields.description: Floor area affected by project (square feet)

fields.name: ListOfSites
fields.label: List of Sites
fields.description: List of sites within a project.

fields.name: NumberOfBuildings
fields.label: Number of Buildings
fields.description: Number of buildings affected by the retrofit.

fields.name: ListOfBuildings
fields.label: List of Buildings
fields.description: List of buildings within a project.

fields.name: IssueDate
fields.label: Issue Date
fields.description: Issue date of loan, bond, etc.

fields.name: FinancingQuoteEffThru
fields.label: Financing Quote Effective Through Date
fields.description: Financing quote effective through date.

fields.name: ProjFacilitatorInst
fields.label: Project Facilitator Institution
fields.description: Institution name for project facilitator.

fields.name: FinanceSpecialistInst
fields.label: Finance Specialist Institution
fields.description: Institutional name for finance specialist.

fields.name: FinancingInst
fields.label: Primary Financier Institution
fields.description: Name of financing institution.

fields.name: ESCOName
fields.label: Project Builder (Contractor) Name
fields.description: Name of energy service company.

fields.name: TONumber
fields.label: Task Order Number
fields.description: Specific agency task order number.

fields.name: TOLastUpdated
fields.label: Task Order: Last Amendment/Modification
fields.description: Last contract modification number (automatically generated)

fields.name: ESCOContractNumber
fields.label: ESCO Contract Number
fields.description: IDIQ contract number with ESCO

fields.name: ConstrPeriod
fields.label: Construction Period
fields.description: Estimated construction period in months.

fields.name: ProjAgreementType
fields.label: Project Agreement Type
fields.description: Project agreement type.

fields.name: TypeOfFinancing
fields.label: Type of Project Financing
fields.description: desc

fields.name: ProjDevCost
fields.label: Project Development Cost
fields.description: Project development costs not attributable to specific ECM (e.g., investment-grade audit, design)

fields.name: ESCOContactName
fields.label: Project Builder (Contractor) Contact Name
fields.description: Project manager at ESCO.

fields.name: ESCOContactEmail
fields.label: Project Builder (Contractor) Contact Email
fields.description: ESCO project manager email address.

fields.name: ESCOContactPhone
fields.label: Project Builder (Contractor) Contact Phone
fields.description: ESCO project manager phone number.

fields.name: CustContactPhone
fields.label: Customer Contact Phone
fields.description: Project manager (customer) phone number.

fields.name: ProjFaciliatorContactName
fields.label: Project Facilitator Contact Name
fields.description: Project facilitator name.

fields.name: ProjFaciliatorContactEmail
fields.label: Project Facilitator Contact Email
fields.description: Project facilitator email address.

fields.name: ProjFaciliatorContactPhone
fields.label: Project Facilitator Contact Phone
fields.description: Project facilitator phone number.

fields.name: FinanceSpecialistContactName
fields.label: Financing Specialist Contact Name
fields.description: Financing specialist name.

fields.name: FinanceSpecialistContactEmail
fields.label: Financing Specialist Contact Email
fields.description: Financing specialist email address.

fields.name: FinanceSpecialistContactPhone
fields.label: Financing Specialist Contact Phone
fields.description: Financing specialist phone number.

fields.name: FinancierContactName
fields.label: Primary Financier Contact Name
fields.description: Financier name.

fields.name: FinancierContactEmail
fields.label: Primary Financier Contact Email
fields.description: Financier email address.

fields.name: FinancierContactPhone
fields.label: Primary Financier Contact Phone
fields.description: Financier phone number.

fields.name: EscRateElec
fields.label: Electricity
fields.description: Annual escalation rate for electricity savings (%).

fields.name: EscRateElecDemand
fields.label: Electric Demand
fields.description: Annual escalation rate for electricity demand (%).

fields.name: EscRateNG
fields.label: NG
fields.description: Annual escalation rate for natural gas savings (%).

fields.name: EscRateWater
fields.label: Water
fields.description: Annual escalation rate for water savings (%).

fields.name: EscRateOtherSavings1
fields.label: Other Savings 1
fields.description: Annual escalation rate for other savings 1 (%).

fields.name: EscRateOtherSavings1Type
fields.label: Other Savings Type 1
fields.description: Annual escalation rate for other savings type 1.

fields.name: EscRateOtherSavings2
fields.label: Other Savings 2
fields.description: Annual escalation rate for other savings 2 (%).

fields.name: EscRateOtherSavings2Type
fields.label: Other Savings Type 2
fields.description: Annual escalation rate for other savings type 2.

fields.name: EscRateOM
fields.label: O&M
fields.description: Annual escalation rate for O&M savings (%).

fields.name: EscRateNonEnergySavings
fields.label: Other Non-Energy
fields.description: Annual escalation rate for non-energy savings (%).

fields.name: PaymentType
fields.label: Annual Payment Timing
fields.description: Payments in beginning of term or end of term .

fields.name: BondedAmt
fields.label: Bonded Amount
fields.description: Bonded amount.

fields.name: FinancingConstrInterest
fields.label: Financing Procurement Price ($): construction interest
fields.description: Includes construction finance costs during the implementation phase of the project ($).

fields.name: FinancingOtherExpenses
fields.label: Financing Procurement Price ($): other expenses
fields.description: Includes administrative expenses and bonding expense during the implementation phase of the project ($).

fields.name: ImplPeriodPayments
fields.label: Implementation Period Payments
fields.description: Payments made by the agency during the implementation period toward the implementation price, thus reducing the amount to be financed ($).

fields.name: ApplicableFinancialIndex
fields.label: Applicable Financial Index
fields.description: Text field to indicate financial index used in defining index rate (ex: US Treasury Note).

fields.name: IndexRate
fields.label: Index Rate (%)
fields.description: Financing index rate (%).

fields.name: AddedPremiumPct
fields.label: AddedPremium (%)
fields.description: Premium above index rate (index + premium = project rate) (%).

fields.name: ProjMarginPct
fields.label: Project Margin (%)
fields.description: Margin represents overall project margin including indirect costs and ESCO profit (%).

fields.name: Incentives
fields.label: Incentives and Other Payments
fields.description: Annual incentive payments ($).

fields.name: MgmtPerfPeriodExp
fields.label: Management/Administration ($)
fields.description: Annual expenses for management/admin. during the performance period ($).

fields.name: OpPerfPeriodExp
fields.label: Operation ($)
fields.description: Annual operations expenses during the performance period ($).

fields.name: MaintPerfPeriodExp
fields.label: Maintenance ($)
fields.description: Annual maintenance expenses during the performance period ($).

fields.name: RepairReplPerfPeriodExp
fields.label: Repair and Replacement ($)
fields.description: Annual repair and replacement expenses during the performance period ($).

fields.name: MVPerfPeriodExp
fields.label: M&V ($)
fields.description: Annual measurement and verification cost during the performance period.

fields.name: Other1PerfPeriodExp
fields.label: Other 1 ($)
fields.description: Other 1 performance period expenses ($).

fields.name: Other2PerfPeriodExp
fields.label: Other 2 ($)
fields.description: Other 2 performance period expenses ($).

fields.name: PerfPeriodMarginPct
fields.label: Performance Period Margin (%)
fields.description: Margin represents overall performance period margin including indirect costs and ESCO profit (%).

fields.name: GuarPctEstSavings
fields.label: Guarantee % of Estimated Savings
fields.description: Guarantee % of estimated savings (%).

fields.name: EstImplPeriodSavings
fields.label: Estimated cost savings for implementation period
fields.description: Calculated field: Estimated cost savings during implementation period ($).

fields.name: GuarImplPeriodSavings
fields.label: Guaranteed cost savings for implementation period
fields.description: Calculated field: Guaranteed cost savings during implementation period ($).

fields.name: ECMSize
fields.label: ECM Size
fields.description: Text Field for general inputs on size of ECM (example: N KW of lighting, N gallons of water)

fields.name: ECMCoverage
fields.label: ECM Coverage
fields.description: % of total project floor area affected by the ECM.

fields.name: MVMethodology
fields.label: M&V Methodology
fields.description: Identify the M & V Methodology used: Option A/B/C/D.

fields.name: ImplExpsInitCost
fields.label: Implementation Cost (Direct)
fields.description: Initial costs associated with implementation of ECM NOT including post-acceptance performance period expenses ($).

fields.name: ImplExpsAppliedIncentives
fields.label: Applied Incentives
fields.description: Applicable incentives that can be claimed after installation ($).

fields.name: BaselineElecKWh
fields.label: Electricity Use (kWh)
fields.description: Baseline electricity usage (kWh).

fields.name: BaselineElecDemandKW
fields.label: Electricity demand (kW/mo)
fields.description: Baseline electric demand (kW/mo).

fields.name: BaselineWaterKgal
fields.label: Baseline-Water use (kgal)
fields.description: Baseline water usage (kGal).

fields.name: BaselineNGMMBtu
fields.label: Natural gas use (MMBtu)
fields.description: Baseline natural gas usage (MMBtu).

fields.name: BaselineOther1EnergyMMBtu
fields.label: Other energy use (1) (MMBtu)
fields.description: Total of other energy use (1), converted to MMBtu.

fields.name: Other1EnergyType
fields.label: Other energy use (1) type
fields.description: Total of other energy use type (1)

fields.name: BaselineOther2EnergyMMBtu
fields.label: Other energy use (2) (MMBtu)
fields.description: Baseline Other 2 energy use (MMBtu).

fields.name: Other2EnergyType
fields.label: Other energy use (2) type
fields.description: Total of other energy use type (2).

fields.name: BaselineEnergyRsrcAmt
fields.label: Energy and resource use ($)
fields.description: The baseline cost of resource usage, in dollars, corresponding with all the proposed savings - NOT including O&M and other non-energy resources.

fields.name: BaselineOMCost
fields.label: O&M costs ($)
fields.description: Baseline O&M costs ($).

fields.name: BaselineNonEnergyCost
fields.label: Other non-energy costs ($)
fields.description: Baseline - other non-energy costs ($).

fields.name: OtherCostType
fields.label: Type of other non-energy costs
fields.description: Specify type of other non-energy costs

fields.label: Electricity use ($)
fields.description: Estimated annual cost savings - Electricity use ($).

fields.name: EstElecDemandSavingsAmt
fields.label: Electricity Demand ($)
fields.description: Annual dollar savings from reducing electricity demand.

fields.name: EstWaterSavingsAmt
fields.label: Water use ($)
fields.description: Estimated annual cost savings - Water use ($).

fields.description: Estimated annual cost savings - Natural Gas ($).

fields.description: Estimated annual cost savings - Other1 energy ($).

fields.name: EstOther2EnergySavingsAmt
fields.label: Other2 energy ($)
fields.description: Estimated annual cost savings - Other2 energy ($).

fields.label: Electricity use (kWh)
fields.description: Estimated annual savings - Electricity use (kWh).

fields.name: EstElecDemandSavingsKW
fields.label: Electricity demand (kW/mo)
fields.description: Estimated annual savings - Electricity demand (kW/mo).

fields.name: EstWaterSavingsKGal
fields.label: Water use (Kgal)
fields.description: Estimated annual savings - Water use (Kgal).

fields.name: EstNGSavingsMMBtu
fields.label: Natural Gas (MMBtu)
fields.description: Estimated annual savings - Natural gas (MMBtu).

fields.name: EstOther1EnergySavingsMMBtu
fields.label: Other1 energy (MMBtu)
fields.description: Estimated annual energy savings blended - Other (1) (MMBtu).

fields.name: EstOther2EnergySavingsMMBtu
fields.label: Other2 energy (MMBtu)
fields.description: Estimated annual energy savings blended - Other (2) (MMBtu).

fields.name: EstAvoidedOMCostAmt
fields.label: Avoided O&M costs ($)
